name: Last Call (Savannah Singh)
description: Last Call is a visual novel game about second chances. You play as a bored bartender that is actually a guardian angel. This is your first dealing with customers that having a near-death experience. The player has to listen to their stories of their lives and respond in a way to get them all to wake up. If the player says the wrong thing, it can lead to the customers dying after having their drinks.
